title: YOOM volumetric plugin
description: Seamlessly integrate YOOM Volumetric Capture in Unreal Engine!
longDescription:
Transform Your Unreal Engine Projects with YOOM Volumetric Plugin

Unlock a new realm of possibilities in your Unreal Engine projects with the YOOM Volumetric Plugin. Our plugin is your gateway to seamlessly incorporating YOOM Volumetric Capture technology, enabling you to revolutionize your creative endeavors.

Immersive Experiences:

Imagine the power of bringing lifelike, three-dimensional video content to your Unreal Engine scenes. With YOOM, you can effortlessly integrate stunning volumetric video, creating immersive and engaging experiences that captivate your audience.

Real-Time Playback:

Experience the magic of YOOM Volumetric Capture in real-time. Whether you're exploring your scenes, in play mode, or as a standalone application, our Real-Time Player lets you witness the enchantment with the click of a button.

Enhance Virtual Productions:

Elevate your virtual production projects with our seamless integration with Unreal Engine's Sequencer. Craft captivating sequences of images for offline rendering or take control of in-game sequences, bringing your vision to life with precision.

Customization Made Easy:

Tailor your volumetric content with ease using our intuitive materials and material segmentation features. Achieve precise control over different elements within your captures, from color to roughness, ensuring your scenes are just right.

Perfect Prop Synchronization:

Enhance your scenes further by seamlessly integrating trackable objects from the Mesh Viewer. Attach prop OBJ files to the Tetavi Player, ensuring perfect synchronization between Tet and Prop animations, and make your projects truly immersive.

Creative Freedom with Sequencer:

With Tetavi Player integrated into Unreal Engine's Sequencer, you have complete creative freedom. Edit timing using the "frame_track" property, synchronize audio and video tracks, and render offline or experience real-time playback—all effortlessly.

Seamless Retiming:

Edit timing within the Sequencer and generate new Tet files with our Retimed Tet Generator. Say goodbye to texture decoding issues and ensure a fluid, lag-free experience for your audience.

Elevate Your Projects:

Unleash the potential of YOOM Volumetric Capture in your Unreal Engine projects. Whether you're in game development, virtual production, or any field that demands immersive visual experiences, YOOM Volumetric Plugin empowers you to take your creations to the next level.

Get Started Today:

Explore YOOM Volumetric Plugin and discover how it can redefine what's possible in Unreal Engine. Elevate your storytelling, boost production quality, and immerse your audience in captivating, lifelike experiences. Start your journey with YOOM today!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Volumetric Integration:

Seamlessly integrate YOOM Volumetric Capture technology into Unreal Engine projects.

  • Real-Time Playback Engine:

Harness the power of our real-time playback engine to visualize volumetric videos instantly.

  • Sequencer Integration:

Fully integrate with Unreal Engine's Sequencer for precise control and sequencing of volumetric content.

  • Material Customization:

Fine-tune materials and material segmentation to achieve precise control over visual elements.

  • Trackable Prop Support:

Effortlessly incorporate trackable objects from the Mesh Viewer for dynamic scene enhancement.

  • Frame-by-Frame Control:

Edit timing with the "frame_track" property for frame-by-frame control and synchronization of audio and video.

  • Retimed Tet Generation:

Generate new Tet files with updated timing, eliminating texture decoding issues for smooth playback.


Code Modules:

  •  Yoom_Plugin (Runtime)
  •  Yoom_Editor (Editor)
  •  YoomProceduralMeshComponent (Runtime)

Number of Blueprints: 1

Number of C++ Classes: 6

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: PC

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, Oculus

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZzTSGxQRygJlTxSDvbMjv4KynJN64eQ6/edit

Example Project: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gM6mJp9mkZZLq5RtHK1qtEZH_bCib1cg/view?usp=sharing

Important/Additional Notes:
